jot.physics

Class AbstractRay

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.AbstractRay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ray

    public abstract class AbstractRay
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that a Ray Class must implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        public abstract org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D getOrientation(double t)
        Get the Ray orientation.
        Parameters:
        t - a scalar to multiply by the ray direction.
        Returns:
        the ray origin plus the scalar multiplication of the ray direction by t.
